content: Unfortunately, he’s not too pleased that you’re in possession of the gold, and will challenge you to a duel. Upon defeat, he’ll relent and offer to let you join him in exploring the Realm of Gold together, before vanishing off behind the giant gate up the stairs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard_(Kingdom_of_Sahali).md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard (Kingdom of Sahali)', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the "Tiger Vanguard"'.
The content is as follows:
Unfortunately, he’s not too pleased that you’re in possession of the gold, and will challenge you to a duel. Upon defeat, he’ll relent and offer to let you join him in exploring the Realm of Gold together, before vanishing off behind the giant gate up the stairs.
